title: What is the most dangerous household substance? - Quora

response.answer_text: Y'all really got to be more specific about these questions. Mindless inquiries without context of any kind are too abstract. Please only request answers if Google has failed to answer. *Many common household items can be dangerous and some by themselves are okay until they're combined with something else* i.e. Windex and chlorox are by themselves alone common and rather safe but should NEVER be mixed.
